str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
Elijah, the prophet. Of Hebrew origin; Helias, an Israelite.
Already; now at length, now after all this waiting. Apparently from e and de; even now.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To come, go.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From epi and ginosko; to know upon some mark, i.e. Recognize; by implication, to become fully acquainted with, to acknowledge.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Plural
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A strengthened form of melo; to intend, i.e. Be about to be, do, or suffer something.
I am acted upon in a certain way, either good or bad; I experience ill treatment, suffer.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).
